title: Issue #1 - Fontaine’s Most Bizarre Creature Coalition
content: Our investigation into Fontaine’s strangest creatures has led us to uncover shocking truths about deep-sea entities, mechanical guardians, and suspicious gatherings near the Court of Fontaine...

title: Issue #2 - Hilichurls Farming & The Ghost Ship Mystery!
content: Hilichurls farming, ghost boats, and more chaos unfold as The Steambird investigates strange happenings across Fontaine. Are we witnessing a shift in Hilichurl society? Or is there a deeper conspiracy at play?

title: Issue #3 - Fire and Fragrance: The Enigma of Emilie
content: A mysterious perfume artisan appears in Fontaine, but her story carries secrets far beyond fragrance. Is Emilie merely a skilled alchemist, or is there something more volatile beneath the surface?

title: Issue #4 - Flight, Feathers, and Foul Play?
content: A bizarre scene unfolds in Fontaine’s wilderness—birds in eerie formation, slimes behaving strangely, and a nest of abandoned eggs. What are they hiding? The Steambird investigates!
